Name: Hat-in-the-Ring Battalion
Details: The Hat-in-the-Ring Battalion (or HRB) is a rather peculiar mercenary unit, noted as having a large number of highly proficient Techs guided by their Master Technician Stuart Bell.  On long term contract to House Davion, they have come up with several creative field refits to common variants that have been adopted by other merc units and even some House units.
